title: SCP-4182
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**SCP-4182:** There is no Site-5
**Author:** [[*user the great hippo]]
**Images:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:%E7%AB%AF%E5%B3%B6_-_panoramio.jpg here], [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Battleship_Island_-_Shot_01_(2012).jpg here], [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Gunkan_Jima_-_panoramio.jpg here], [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Sepolcreto_della_%22Rotonda%22_dell%27Ospedale_Maggiore_di_Milano_(1907)_(19725505594).jpg here], and [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Sepolcreto_della_%22Rotonda%22_dell%27Ospedale_Maggiore_di_Milano_(1907)_(20339686922).jpg here]. The air siren I got from [https://youtu.be/msX8iULEQgA here] (slowed down); the video, I made myself (and hereby provide under CC 3.0). It includes a clip from this video (which is also CC 3.0): [https://vimeo.com/4557534 Here].

**Music:** [https://youtu.be/5XZ_5B5mJS0 Milgram's 37] (Peter Gabriel)
----
[[include :scpsandbox2:hippo]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:more]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
